subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Before St. John’s 57-56 victory Saturday in Storrs, No. 2 Connecticut had not lost at home since 2007 and had not lost to an unranked team at home since 1993.
snippet: Before St. John’s 57-56 victory Saturday in Storrs, No. 2 Connecticut had not lost at home since 2007 and had not lost to an unranked team at home since 1993.
